Stewart Smith Financial, LLC is an independent financial advisory firm based in Greenville, South Carolina. The firm provides retirement income planning, Medicare guidance, investment advice, and insurance-based financial strategies to individuals and families throughout the Southeastern United States.
Overview
According to the company, Stewart Smith Financial’s advisors focus on understanding each client’s unique goals and providing strategies aimed at building confidence and clarity throughout the retirement journey.
The firm combines investment and insurance planning with clear communication and regular client collaboration to ensure that each financial plan evolves in tandem with changing life circumstances.
Services and consultations are available in both English and Spanish. The firm’s stated mission is to treat every client “like family,” offering guidance and solutions designed to help them feel confident in their financial decisions.
History
Stewart Smith Financial was founded in 2021 by  financial advisor and U.S. military veteran Stewart S. Smith.
Smith has more than 23 years of experience in the financial services industry and focuses on educating clients as they transition from the accumulation to the distribution phase of retirement. It is headquartered in Greenville, South Carolina, within the Park 37 Business Park. The firm became accredited by the Better Business Bureau (BBB) on August 2, 2022, and currently holds an A+ rating.
Services
Stewart Smith Financial provides retirement planning and financial advisory services focused on income distribution, investment strategy, and insurance planning.
The firm regularly hosts educational events on topics such as Social Security, Medicare, and tax-efficient retirement strategies.
Medicare Planning
The firm includes an in-office Medicare specialist, Mark Nestberg, who assists clients through the Medicare enrollment process and plan selection.
Nestberg guides plan comparisons, coverage coordination, and integration of Medicare with private insurance and retirement income strategies. This service is presented as part of Stewart Smith Financial’s comprehensive approach to retirement planning.
Business practices & client focus
Stewart Smith Financial highlights its bilingual capability and its emphasis on long-term client relationships. The firm promotes a philosophy centered on trust, transparency, and adaptability, reviewing client plans regularly to ensure continued alignment with financial goals and market conditions.
Recognition & accreditation
The company is accredited by the Better Business Bureau and maintains an A+ rating.
